entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: SW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
